subject: Atlantic Yards (Brooklyn)
Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Nets are unlikely to attract current marquee N.B.A. players because none of them can envision the Brooklyn arena or how the team will fit into the area’s sports lineup.
snippet: The Nets are unlikely to attract current marquee N.B.A. players because none of them can envision the Brooklyn arena or how the team will fit into the area’s sports lineup.
